name: Foster Care Services
description: A Better Way supports individuals, couples, and families to provide safe, nurturing environments through foster care and foster-to-adoption. After preparing and legally approving to foster or foster-to-adopt, A Better Way matches the individual with a child/children and supports the person to nurture them. Families receive individualized support, family therapy, on-call crisis support, trainings, free approval/matching/placement services, and medical/dental/therapy services for the child in care
